item.description:
Our book club is monthly, very relaxed and sociable. Come on by! We meet the second Tuesday of every month.  This month we met at the Library restaurant but next month, in February, it may be changed.  The date will certainly be changed as the second Tuesday of the month falls on Valentine's day.  Please stay tuned for more details.

If you have not read the book but would still like to visit, please feel free to meet up with us anyhow. I get this question a lot. We would love to have you come on by and meet with us so you can get a good feel for the club.  There have been times when I have not finished the book!  Don't worry about it.

Preceding our book club discussion will be a 15-20 minute discussion/reading from a touring author.  Click on the upcoming group meetup to discover who that author may be.  After this, we commence the book club in a round-robin fashion where each member discusses briefly what they enjoyed or disliked about the book.  Then we open it up into an open discussion.  Afterwards, the ones who brought selections for the next book club are offered a time to "pitch" the book.  We then do a democratic selection on the next book, thereby ensuring that only the participating members who went to the meeting are the ones able to pick the next book.

Authors:  If you would like to take part in a meeting, please contact the organizer.
item.name: The Portsmouth Book Club Meetup
